description: Creates an Amazon Chime SDK messaging AppInstance under an AWS account. Only SDK messaging customers use this API. CreateAppInstance supports idempotency behavior as described in the AWS API Standard. identity.

parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: The unique ID of the request. Use different tokens to create different AppInstances. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Tags assigned to the AppInstance. (dict) --- A tag object containing a key-value pair. The key in a tag. The value in a tag.

nested_items.name: AppInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the AppInstance.
